translations: n．侨民，流亡者：离开自己国家的人，尤指因政治原因而流亡他国的人。
· Many émigrés returned to their homeland after the political situation improved.
政治局势好转后，许多侨民返回了自己的祖国。

sentences.sentence: Several hundred Bosnian refugees and émigrés demonstrated outside the main entrance.
sentences.translation: 数百位波斯尼亚难民和政治流亡者在主入口外示威。

sentences.sentence: Napoleon granted the great majority of émigrés amnesty in 1802.
sentences.translation: 1802年拿破仑对大部分流亡者给予特赦。

sentences.sentence: The young Lev Bronstein (later Leon Trotsky), Isaac Babel, a writer, and Vladimir Jabotinsky, one of the fathers of modern Zionism, were among later émigrés.
sentences.translation: 青年列弗•布朗斯坦(后来叫里昂•托洛茨基)、作家艾萨克•巴别塔、犹太复国运动奠基人之一弗拉基米尔是这座城市后来的流亡者。
